title: leeveshkumarweb
description:
• Personal portfolio showcasing projects, skills, and experience.
• Responsive design built with React.js and Vanilla CSS.
• Integrated contact form with email functionality.
• Features smooth animations, GitHub/project links, and clean UI/UX.

title: taskifyPro
description:
• Full-stack task management app to organize personal and team tasks.
• Built with MERN stack and Redux for state management.
• Features user auth, deadline reminders, and drag-and-drop task boards.

title: weatherSnap
description:
• Real-time weather app using OpenWeatherMap API.
• Built with React and Axios to fetch and display dynamic weather data.
• Responsive design with geolocation support and animated icons.

title: WeatherForcast
description:
• Real-time weather app using OpenWeatherMap API.
• Built with React and Axios to fetch and display dynamic weather data.
• Responsive design with geolocation support and animated icons.
